commandlineinfo:
USAGE: ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
dotnet ServerLogSizeMonitoring.dll -filepath "C:\Temp\Files.csv" -factfilepath "C:\Temp\FileStats.csv" -outputdir "C:\Temp\GrowthInfo" -ignoreDataErrors true | false | 0 | 1 -ignoreEmptyFile true | false | 0 | 1 -loglevel info | debug | error
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- All following three parameters are mandatory -filepath : Full path of the input file (Files.csv) within double quotes -factfilepath : Full path of the fact file (FileStats.csv) within double quotes -outputdir : Output folder where generated fact data sets are expected to placed.
Optional Parameters -ignoreDataErrors :if input true or 1, it skips the failed records and proceeds with rest of the records. if input is false or 0, it immediately throws exception on data conversion error and halts the process. -ignoreEmptyFile : if input true or 1, it skips the failed records and proceeds with rest of the records. if input is false or 0, it immediately throws exception on data conversion error and halts the process. -loglevel : if nothing passed, info level will be used
Defaults: -ignoreDataErrors : true, -ignoreEmptyFile = true , loglevel = info ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
